about.summary: Provides a mechanism for chaining commands with a new forward-pipe operator, %>%. This operator will forward a value, or the result of an expression, into the next function call/expression. There is flexible support for the type of right-hand side expressions. For more information, see package vignette. To quote Rene Magritte, "Ceci n'est pas un pipe."

name: r-magrittr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.5" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-magrittr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: magrittr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/magrittr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/magrittr/magrittr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 05c45943ada9443134caa0ab24db4a962b629f00b755ccf039a2a2a7b2c92ae8

build:
  noarch: generic
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 1003
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('magrittr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('magrittr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=magrittr
  license: MIT
  summary: Provides a mechanism for chaining commands with a new forward-pipe operator, %>%. This operator will forward a value, or the result of an expression, into the next function call/expression. There is flexible support for the type of right-hand side expressions. For more information, see package vignette. To quote
    Rene Magritte, "Ceci n'est pas un pipe."
  license_family: MIT

  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - ocefpaf
    - johanneskoester
    - bgruening
    - daler
    - jdblischak
    - cbrueffer
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
